content.html: The new @McDonalds advert is not only annoying, it is promoting bad OpSec and practices and encouraging office staff to follow them. Let's have a look at the office and try and prevent them having to watch corporate security videos! 1/7 - Note the unlocked workstations #OpSecFail
content.value:
The new @McDonalds advert is not only annoying, it is promoting bad OpSec and practices and encouraging office staff to follow them.
Let's have a look at the office and try and prevent them having to watch corporate security videos!
1/7 - Note the unlocked workstations #OpSecFail
